https://doi.org/10.7927/H4WS8R5B.Description: The Global Multihazard Proportional Economic Loss Risk Deciles shows areas at higher risk for economic loss due to drought, earthquakes, and volcanoes. These data can aid in disaster preparedness and recovery research.

https://doi.org/10.7927/H4S180F9.Description: The Global Multihazard Total Economic Loss Risk Deciles shows areas around the world that are at higher risk for overall economic loss due to multiple hazards such as cyclones, droughts, earthquakes, floods, landslides, and volcanoes. These data can aid in disaster preparedness and recovery research.
